foreignNames.flavor: "Não existem obstáculos, só caminhos diferentes."

foreignNames.name: Мистик Тайного Пути
foreignNames.text:
Мистик Тайного Пути не может быть заблокирован.
Оборотень {2}{U} (Вы можете разыграть эту карту рубашкой вверх как существо 2/2 за {3}. Переверните ее рубашкой вниз в любой момент за ее стоимость Оборотня.)
foreignNames.flavor: «Препятствий нет. Есть лишь разные пути».

foreignNames.name: 隐宗秘教徒
foreignNames.text:
隐宗秘教徒不能被阻挡。
变身{2}{U}（你可牌面朝下地施放此牌并支付{3}，将其当成2/2生物。可随时支付其变身费用使其翻回正面。）
foreignNames.flavor: 「世上没有不通的路，只有未觉之道。」

foreignNames.name: 隱宗秘教徒
foreignNames.text:
隱宗秘教徒不能被阻擋。
變身{2}{U}（你可牌面朝下地施放此牌並支付{3}，將其當成2/2生物。可隨時支付其變身費用使其翻回正面。）
foreignNames.flavor: 「世上沒有不通的路，只有未覺之道。」

cards.originalText:
Mystic of the Hidden Way can't be blocked.
Morph {2}{U} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)

cards.name: Dragon's Eye Savants
cards.text:
Morph—Reveal a blue card in your hand. (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)
When Dragon's Eye Savants is turned face up, look at target opponent's hand.

rulings.text: Morph lets you cast a card face down by paying {3}, and lets you turn the face-down permanent face up any time you have priority by paying its morph cost.

The face-down spell has no mana cost and has a converted mana cost of 0. When you cast a face-down spell, put it on the stack face down so no other player knows what it is, and pay {3}. This is an alternative cost.

When the spell resolves, it enters the battlefield as a 2/2 creature with no name, mana cost, creature types, or abilities. It’s colorless and has a converted mana cost of 0. Other effects that apply to the creature can still grant it any of these characteristics.

Any time you have priority, you may turn the face-down creature face up by revealing what its morph cost is and paying that cost. This is a special action. It doesn’t use the stack and can’t be responded to. Only a face-down permanent can be turned face up this way; a face-down spell cannot.
Because the permanent is on the battlefield both before and after it’s turned face up, turning a permanent face up doesn’t cause any enters-the-battlefield abilities to trigger.

A permanent that turns face up or face down changes characteristics but is otherwise the same permanent. Spells and abilities that were targeting that permanent, as well as Auras and Equipment that were attached to the permanent, aren’t affected.
At any time, you can look at a face-down spell or permanent you control. You can’t look at face-down spells or permanents you don’t control unless an effect instructs you to do so.

You must ensure that your face-down spells and permanents can easily be differentiated from each other. You’re not allowed to mix up the cards that represent them on the battlefield in order to confuse other players. The order they entered the battlefield should remain clear. Common methods for doing this include using markers or dice, or simply placing them in order on the battlefield.
If a face-down permanent leaves the battlefield, you must reveal it. You must also reveal all face-down spells and permanents you control if you leave the game or if the game ends.

foreignNames.name: Weise des Drachenauges
foreignNames.text:
Morph—Zeige eine blaue Karte auf deiner Hand offen vor. (Du kannst diese Karte verdeckt für {3} als eine 2/2 Kreatur wirken. Decke sie zu einem beliebigen Zeitpunkt für ihre Morph-Kosten auf.)
Wenn die Weisen des Drachenauges aufgedeckt werden, schaue dir die Karten auf der Hand eines Gegners deiner Wahl an.

foreignNames.name: Sabios del ojo del dragón
foreignNames.text:
Metamorfosis—Muestra una carta azul de tu mano. (Puedes lanzar esta carta boca abajo como una criatura 2/2 pagando {3}. Ponla boca arriba en cualquier momento pagando su coste de metamorfosis.)
Cuando los Sabios del ojo del dragón se pongan boca arriba, mira la mano del oponente objetivo.

foreignNames.name: Savants de l'Œil du dragon
foreignNames.text:
Mue — Révélez une carte bleue de votre main. (Vous pouvez lancer cette carte face cachée comme une créature 2/2 pour {3}. Retournez-la à tout moment pour son coût de mue.)
Quand les Savants de l'Œil du dragon sont retournés face visible, regardez la main d'un adversaire ciblé.

foreignNames.name: Sapienti dell'Occhio di Drago
foreignNames.text:
Metamorfosi—Rivela una carta blu dalla tua mano. (Puoi lanciare questa carta a faccia in giù come una creatura 2/2 pagando {3}. Girala a faccia in su in qualsiasi momento pagando il suo costo di metamorfosi.)
Quando i Sapienti dell'Occhio di Drago vengono girati a faccia in su, guarda la mano di un avversario bersaglio.

foreignNames.name: 龍の眼の学者
foreignNames.text:
変異 ― あなたの手札にある青のカードを１枚公開する。（あなたはこのカードを、{3}で２/２クリーチャーとして裏向きに唱えてもよい。これの変異コストで、これをいつでも表向きにしてよい。）
龍の眼の学者が表向きになったとき、対戦相手１人を対象とし、そのプレイヤーの手札を見る。

foreignNames.name: 용의 눈 석학
foreignNames.text:
변이—당신의 손에서 청색 카드 한 장을 공개한다. (당신은 {3}을 지불해서 이 카드를 뒷면 상태의 2/2 생물로 발동할 수 있다. 언제든지 변이 비용을 지불하고 앞면이 보이도록 뒤집을 수 있다.)
용의 눈 석학이 앞면으로 뒤집히면, 상대를 목표로 정한다. 그 상대의 손을 본다.

foreignNames.name: Sábios do Olho do Dragão
foreignNames.text:
Metamorfose — Revele um card azul na sua mão. (Você pode conjurar este card com a face voltada para baixo como uma criatura 2/2 por {3}. Volte sua face para cima a qualquer momento pagando seu custo de metamorfose.)
Quando Sábios do Olho do Dragão for voltado para cima, olhe a mão do oponente alvo.

foreignNames.name: Мудрецы Ока Дракона
foreignNames.text:
Оборотень — Покажите синюю карту, находящуюся в вашей руке. (Вы можете разыграть эту карту рубашкой вверх как существо 2/2 за {3}. Переверните ее рубашкой вниз в любой момент за ее стоимость Оборотня.)
Когда Мудрецы Ока Дракона переворачиваются рубашкой вниз, посмотрите руку целевого оппонента.

foreignNames.name: 龙目学者
foreignNames.text:
变身～从你手上展示一张蓝色牌。（你可牌面朝下地施放此牌并支付{3}，将其当成2/2生物。可随时支付其变身费用使其翻回正面。）
当龙目学者翻回正面时，检视目标对手的手牌。

foreignNames.name: 龍目學者
foreignNames.text:
變身～從你手上展示一張藍色牌。（你可牌面朝下地施放此牌並支付{3}，將其當成2/2生物。可隨時支付其變身費用使其翻回正面。）
當龍目學者翻回正面時，檢視目標對手的手牌。

cards.originalText:
Morph—Reveal a blue card in your hand. (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)
When Dragon's Eye Savants is turned face up, look at target opponent's hand.

cards.name: Mardu Hateblade
cards.text: {B}: Mardu Hateblade gains deathtouch until end of turn. (Any amount of damage it deals to a creature is enough to destroy it.)
cards.flavor: "There may be little honor in my tactics, but there is no honor in losing."

foreignNames.name: Mardu-Hassklinge
foreignNames.text: {B}: Die Mardu-Hassklinge erhält Todesberührung bis zum Ende des Zuges. (Eine beliebige Menge Schadenspunkte, die sie einer Kreatur zufügt, sind ausreichend, um diese zu zerstören.)
foreignNames.flavor: „Meine Taktiken mögen wenig ehrenhaft sein, doch nichts ist ehrloser als eine Niederlage."

foreignNames.name: Inquinafilos mardu
foreignNames.text: {B}: El Inquinafilos mardu gana la habilidad de toque mortal hasta el final del turno. (Cualquier cantidad de daño que haga a una criatura es suficiente para destruirla.)
foreignNames.flavor: "Tal vez mis tácticas carezcan de honor, pero no hay honor en la derrota".

foreignNames.name: Hachefiel marduen
foreignNames.text: {B} : Le Hachefiel marduen acquiert le contact mortel jusqu'à la fin du tour. (Le nombre de blessures qu'il inflige à une créature, quel qu'il soit, est suffisant pour la détruire.)
foreignNames.flavor: « Mes tactiques ne sont peut-être pas honorables, mais perdre ne l'est pas non plus. »

foreignNames.name: Lama d'Odio Mardu
foreignNames.text: {B}: La Lama d'Odio Mardu ha tocco letale fino alla fine del turno. (Qualsiasi danno che questa creatura infligge a una creatura è sufficiente a distruggerla.)
foreignNames.flavor: "Le mie strategie non saranno molto onorevoli, ma c'è più disonore nella sconfitta."

foreignNames.name: マルドゥの悪刃
foreignNames.text: {B}：ターン終了時まで、マルドゥの悪刃は接死を得る。（これが何らかのダメージをクリーチャーに与えたら、それだけで破壊する。）
foreignNames.flavor: 「俺の戦術に名誉もへったくれもあったものじゃないが、負けるよりはマシさ。」

foreignNames.name: 마르두 증오검
foreignNames.text: {B}: 마르두 증오검은 턴종료까지 치명타를 얻는다. (이 생물에게 피해를 입은 생물은 입은 피해의 양에 상관없이 파괴된다.)
foreignNames.flavor: "내 전술이 명예롭지 못하다고 하지만, 패배에는 명예가 없지."

foreignNames.name: Lâmina de Ódio Mardu
foreignNames.text: {B}: Lâmina de Ódio Mardu ganha toque mortífero até o final do turno. (Qualquer quantidade de dano que ela cause a uma criatura é suficiente para destruí-la.)
foreignNames.flavor: "Minhas táticas podem não ter muita honra, mas não há honra nenhuma em perder."

foreignNames.name: Рубака Ненависти Марду
foreignNames.text: {B}: Рубака Ненависти Марду получает Смертельное касание до конца хода. (Любое количество повреждений, которое он наносит существу, достаточно для того, чтобы его уничтожить.)
foreignNames.flavor: «Пусть в моей тактике мало чести, но в поражении чести нет вовсе».

foreignNames.name: 玛尔都仇刃兵
foreignNames.text: {B}：玛尔都仇刃兵获得死触异能直到回合结束。（它对生物造成的任何数量伤害都足以消灭后者。）
foreignNames.flavor: 「可能我的战术不太光彩，但战场上输了更不光彩。」

foreignNames.name: 瑪爾都仇刃兵
foreignNames.text: {B}：瑪爾都仇刃兵獲得死觸異能直到回合結束。（它對生物造成的任何數量傷害都足以消滅後者。）
foreignNames.flavor: 「可能我的戰術不太光彩，但戰場上輸了更不光彩。」

cards.originalText: {B}: Mardu Hateblade gains deathtouch until end of turn. (Any amount of damage it deals to a creature is enough to destroy it.)

cards.name: Mardu Heart-Piercer
cards.text: Raid — When Mardu Heart-Piercer enters the battlefield, if you attacked with a creature this turn, Mardu Heart-Piercer deals 2 damage to any target.
cards.flavor: "Those who have never ridden before the wind do not know the true joy of war."

rulings.text: Raid abilities care only that you attacked with a creature. It doesn’t matter how many creatures you attacked with, or which opponent or planeswalker controlled by an opponent those creatures attacked.

Raid abilities evaluate the entire turn to see if you attacked with a creature. That creature doesn’t have to still be on the battlefield. Similarly, the player or planeswalker it attacked doesn’t have to still be in the game or on the battlefield, respectively.

foreignNames.name: Mardu-Herzstecher
foreignNames.text: Überfall — Wenn der Mardu-Herzstecher ins Spiel kommt und falls du in diesem Zug mit mindestens einer Kreatur angegriffen hast, fügt der Mardu-Herzstecher einer Kreatur oder einem Spieler deiner Wahl 2 Schadenspunkte zu.
foreignNames.flavor: „Wer noch nie vor dem Wind geritten ist, kennt die wahren Freuden des Krieges nicht."

foreignNames.name: Perforacorazones mardu
foreignNames.text: Incursión — Cuando la Perforacorazones mardu entre al campo de batalla, si atacaste con una criatura este turno, la Perforacorazones mardu hace 2 puntos de daño a la criatura o jugador objetivo.
foreignNames.flavor: "Aquellos que nunca han cabalgado con el viento a favor no conocen el auténtico placer de la guerra".

foreignNames.name: Perce-cœur marduenne
foreignNames.text: Saccage — Quand la Perce-cœur marduenne arrive sur le champ de bataille, si vous avez attaqué avec une créature ce tour-ci, la Perce-cœur marduenne inflige 2 blessures à une cible, créature ou joueur.
foreignNames.flavor: « Ceux qui n'ont jamais chevauché dans le vent ne connaissent rien des joies de la guerre. »

foreignNames.name: Trafiggicuore Mardu
foreignNames.text: Incursione — Quando la Trafiggicuore Mardu entra nel campo di battaglia, se hai attaccato con una creatura in questo turno, la Trafiggicuore Mardu infligge 2 danni a una creatura o a un giocatore bersaglio.
foreignNames.flavor: "Chi non ha mai cavalcato col vento alle spalle non conosce la vera gioia della guerra."

foreignNames.name: マルドゥの心臓貫き
foreignNames.text: 強襲 ― マルドゥの心臓貫きが戦場に出たとき、このターンにあなたがクリーチャーで攻撃していた場合、クリーチャー１体かプレイヤー１人を対象とする。マルドゥの心臓貫きはそれに２点のダメージを与える。
foreignNames.flavor: 「風を背にして騎乗したことのない者は、戦争の本当の楽しみを知らぬ者だ。」

foreignNames.name: 마르두 명사수
foreignNames.text: 습격 — 마르두 명사수가 전장에 들어올 때, 당신이 이 턴에 생물로 공격했다면 생물이나 플레이어를 목표로 정한다. 마르두 명사수는 그 목표에 피해 2점을 입힌다.
foreignNames.flavor: "바람을 타고 달려보지 못한 이들은 전쟁의 진정한 재미를 모르는 셈이다."

foreignNames.name: Perfurador de Corações Mardu
foreignNames.text: Raide — Quando Perfurador de Corações Mardu entra no campo de batalha, se você atacou com uma criatura neste turno, Perfurador de Corações Mardu causa 2 pontos de dano à criatura ou ao jogador alvo.
foreignNames.flavor: "Aqueles que nunca cavalgaram com o vento não conhecem o verdadeiro prazer da guerra."

foreignNames.name: Марду, Пронзатель Сердец
foreignNames.text: Набег — Когда Марду, Пронзатель Сердец выходит на поле битвы, если в этом ходу вы атаковали существом, Марду, Пронзатель Сердец наносит 2 повреждения целевому существу или игроку.
foreignNames.flavor: «Тот, кто не скакал быстрее ветра, не познал упоения в бою».

foreignNames.name: 玛尔都穿心客
foreignNames.text: 突击～当玛尔都穿心客进战场时，若你于本回合中曾以生物攻击，则玛尔都穿心客对目标生物或牌手造成2点伤害。
foreignNames.flavor: 「那些从未顺风骑行的人不会知道战争真正的乐趣。」

foreignNames.name: 瑪爾都穿心客
foreignNames.text: 突擊～當瑪爾都穿心客進戰場時，若你於本回合中曾以生物攻擊，則瑪爾都穿心客對目標生物或玩家造成2點傷害。
foreignNames.flavor: 「那些從未順風騎行的人不會知道戰爭真正的樂趣。」

cards.originalText: Raid — When Mardu Heart-Piercer enters the battlefield, if you attacked with a creature this turn, Mardu Heart-Piercer deals 2 damage to target creature or player.

cards.name: Mardu Hordechief
cards.text: Raid — When Mardu Hordechief enters the battlefield, if you attacked with a creature this turn, create a 1/1 white Warrior creature token.
cards.flavor: The horde grows with each assault.

rulings.text: Raid abilities care only that you attacked with a creature. It doesn’t matter how many creatures you attacked with, or which opponent or planeswalker controlled by an opponent those creatures attacked.

Raid abilities evaluate the entire turn to see if you attacked with a creature. That creature doesn’t have to still be on the battlefield. Similarly, the player or planeswalker it attacked doesn’t have to still be in the game or on the battlefield, respectively.

foreignNames.name: Mardu-Hordenhäuptling
foreignNames.text: Überfall — Wenn der Mardu-Hordenhäuptling ins Spiel kommt und falls du in diesem Zug mit mindestens einer Kreatur angegriffen hast, bringe einen 1/1 weißen Krieger-Kreaturenspielstein ins Spiel.
foreignNames.flavor: Die Horde wird mit jedem Angriff größer.

foreignNames.name: Jefe de hordas mardu
foreignNames.text: Incursión — Cuando el Jefe de hordas mardu entre al campo de batalla, si atacaste con una criatura este turno, pon en el campo de batalla una ficha de criatura Guerrero blanca 1/1.
foreignNames.flavor: La horda crece con cada asalto.

foreignNames.name: Chef de horde marduen
foreignNames.text: Saccage — Quand le Chef de horde marduen arrive sur le champ de bataille, si vous avez attaqué avec une créature ce tour-ci, mettez sur le champ de bataille un jeton de créature 1/1 blanche Guerrier.
foreignNames.flavor: La horde grandit à chaque assaut.

foreignNames.name: Condottiero dell'Orda Mardu
foreignNames.text: Incursione — Quando il Condottiero dell'Orda Mardu entra nel campo di battaglia, se hai attaccato con una creatura in questo turno, metti sul campo di battaglia una pedina creatura Guerriero 1/1 bianca.
foreignNames.flavor: L'orda cresce ad ogni assalto.

foreignNames.name: マルドゥの軍族長
foreignNames.text: 強襲 ― マルドゥの軍族長が戦場に出たとき、このターンにあなたがクリーチャーで攻撃していた場合、白の１/１の戦士・クリーチャー・トークンを１体戦場に出す。
foreignNames.flavor: 攻勢に出るたびに、軍族の規模は膨れ上がっていく。

foreignNames.name: 마르두 족장
foreignNames.text: 습격 — 마르두 족장이 전장에 들어올 때, 당신이 이 턴에 생물로 공격했다면, 1/1 백색 전사 생물 토큰 한 개를 전장에 놓는다.
foreignNames.flavor: 부족은 공격을 통해 성장한다.

foreignNames.name: Chefe da Horda Mardu
foreignNames.text: Raide — Quando Chefe da Horda Mardu entrar no campo de batalha, se você atacou com uma criatura neste turno, coloque no campo de batalha uma ficha de criatura branca 1/1 do tipo Guerreiro.
foreignNames.flavor: A horda cresce a cada ataque.

foreignNames.name: Вождь Орды Марду
foreignNames.text: Набег — Когда Вождь Орды Марду выходит на поле битвы, если в этом ходу вы атаковали существом, положите на поле битвы одну фишку существа 1/1 белый Воин.
foreignNames.flavor: Орда растет с каждым походом.

foreignNames.name: 玛尔都部落长
foreignNames.text: 突击～当玛尔都部落长进战场时，若你于本回合中曾以生物攻击，则将一个1/1白色战士衍生生物放进战场。
foreignNames.flavor: 每一次突袭都让部落更加壮大。

foreignNames.name: 瑪爾都部落長
foreignNames.text: 突擊～當瑪爾都部落長進戰場時，若你於本回合中曾以生物攻擊，則將一個1/1白色戰士衍生生物放進戰場。
foreignNames.flavor: 每一次突襲都讓部落更加壯大。

cards.originalText: Raid — When Mardu Hordechief enters the battlefield, if you attacked with a creature this turn, put a 1/1 white Warrior creature token onto the battlefield.

cards.name: Mardu Roughrider
cards.text: Whenever Mardu Roughrider attacks, target creature can't block this turn.
cards.flavor: The most ferocious saddlebrutes lead the assault, ramming through massed pikes and stout barricades as if they were paper and silk.

foreignNames.name: Mardu-Raureiter
foreignNames.text: Immer wenn der Mardu-Raureiter angreift, kann eine Kreatur deiner Wahl in diesem Zug nicht blocken.
foreignNames.flavor: Die hitzigsten Sattelrohlinge reiten dem Angriff voraus und rammen sich durch Spieße und Barrikaden, als wären sie aus Papier und Seide.

foreignNames.name: Jinete audaz mardu
foreignNames.text: Siempre que el Jinete audaz mardu ataque, la criatura objetivo no puede bloquear este turno.
foreignNames.flavor: Los más feroces jinetes brutales lideran el asalto, derribando las picas y las firmes barricadas como si fueran de papel y seda.

foreignNames.name: Dresseur marduen
foreignNames.text: À chaque fois que le Dresseur marduen attaque, la créature ciblée ne peut pas bloquer ce tour-ci.
foreignNames.flavor: Les brutes hussardes les plus féroces mènent l'assaut, détruisant les forêts de piques et enfonçant les barricades comme du papier de soie.

foreignNames.name: Domatore Mardu
foreignNames.text: Ogniqualvolta il Domatore Mardu attacca, una creatura bersaglio non può bloccare in questo turno.
foreignNames.flavor: I più feroci cavalieri bestiali conducono l'assalto, sfondando folle di picchieri e solide barricate come se fossero carta e seta.

foreignNames.name: マルドゥの荒くれ乗り
foreignNames.text: マルドゥの荒くれ乗りが攻撃するたび、クリーチャー１体を対象とする。このターン、それではブロックできない。
foreignNames.flavor: もっとも獰猛な鞍暴れが攻勢を先導し、彼らは密集した長槍や頑丈なバリケードを紙か絹を引き裂くかのように突き破りながら進撃する。

foreignNames.name: 거친 마르두 기수

cards.originalText: Whenever Mardu Roughrider attacks, target creature can't block this turn.

cards.name: Mardu Skullhunter
cards.text:
Mardu Skullhunter enters the battlefield tapped.
Raid — When Mardu Skullhunter enters the battlefield, if you attacked with a creature this turn, target opponent discards a card.

rulings.text: Raid abilities care only that you attacked with a creature. It doesn’t matter how many creatures you attacked with, or which opponent or planeswalker controlled by an opponent those creatures attacked.

Raid abilities evaluate the entire turn to see if you attacked with a creature. That creature doesn’t have to still be on the battlefield. Similarly, the player or planeswalker it attacked doesn’t have to still be in the game or on the battlefield, respectively.

cards.name: Master of Pearls
cards.text:
Morph {3}{W}{W} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)
When Master of Pearls is turned face up, creatures you control get +2/+2 until end of turn.

rulings.text: Any time you have priority, you may turn the face-down creature face up by revealing what its morph cost is and paying that cost. This is a special action. It doesn’t use the stack and can’t be responded to. Only a face-down permanent can be turned face up this way; a face-down spell cannot.
Because the permanent is on the battlefield both before and after it’s turned face up, turning a permanent face up doesn’t cause any enters-the-battlefield abilities to trigger.

A permanent that turns face up or face down changes characteristics but is otherwise the same permanent. Spells and abilities that were targeting that permanent, as well as Auras and Equipment that were attached to the permanent, aren’t affected.
At any time, you can look at a face-down spell or permanent you control. You can’t look at face-down spells or permanents you don’t control unless an effect instructs you to do so.

You must ensure that your face-down spells and permanents can easily be differentiated from each other. You’re not allowed to mix up the cards that represent them on the battlefield in order to confuse other players. The order they entered the battlefield should remain clear. Common methods for doing this include using markers or dice, or simply placing them in order on the battlefield.
If a face-down permanent leaves the battlefield, you must reveal it. You must also reveal all face-down spells and permanents you control if you leave the game or if the game ends.
Morph lets you cast a card face down by paying {3}, and lets you turn the face-down permanent face up any time you have priority by paying its morph cost.

The face-down spell has no mana cost and has a converted mana cost of 0. When you cast a face-down spell, put it on the stack face down so no other player knows what it is, and pay {3}. This is an alternative cost.

When the spell resolves, it enters the battlefield as a 2/2 creature with no name, mana cost, creature types, or abilities. It’s colorless and has a converted mana cost of 0. Other effects that apply to the creature can still grant it any of these characteristics.

foreignNames.name: Caminante de los pinos
foreignNames.text:
Metamorfosis {4}{G}. (Puedes lanzar esta carta boca abajo como una criatura 2/2 pagando {3}. Ponla boca arriba en cualquier momento pagando su coste de metamorfosis.)
Siempre que el Caminante de los pinos u otra criatura que controlas se ponga boca arriba, endereza esa criatura.

foreignNames.name: Marcheur des pinèdes
foreignNames.text:
Mue {4}{G} (Vous pouvez lancer cette carte face cachée comme une créature 2/2 pour {3}. Retournez-la à tout moment pour son coût de mue.)
À chaque fois que le Marcheur des pinèdes ou une autre créature que vous contrôlez est retournée face visible, dégagez cette créature.

foreignNames.name: Errante dei Pini
foreignNames.text:
Metamorfosi {4}{G} (Puoi lanciare questa carta a faccia in giù come una creatura 2/2 pagando {3}. Girala a faccia in su in qualsiasi momento pagando il suo costo di metamorfosi.)
Ogniqualvolta l'Errante dei Pini o un'altra creatura che controlli vengono girati a faccia in su, STAPpa quella creatura.

foreignNames.name: 松歩き
foreignNames.text:
変異{4}{G}（あなたはこのカードを、{3}で２/２クリーチャーとして裏向きに唱えてもよい。これの変異コストで、これをいつでも表向きにしてよい。）
松歩きかあなたがコントロールする他のクリーチャーが１体表向きになるたび、そのクリーチャーをアンタップする。

foreignNames.name: 걸어다니는 소나무
foreignNames.text:
변이 {4}{G} (당신은 {3}을 지불해서 이 카드를 뒷면 상태의 2/2 생물로 발동할 수 있다. 언제든지 변이 비용을 지불하고 앞면이 보이도록 뒤집을 수 있다.)
걸어다니는 소나무나 당신이 조종하는 다른 생물이 앞면으로 뒤집힐 때마다, 그 생물을 언탭한다.

foreignNames.name: Caminhante dos Pinheiros
foreignNames.text:
Metamorfose {4}{G} (Você pode conjurar este card com a face voltada para baixo como uma criatura 2/2 por {3}. Volte sua face para cima a qualquer momento pagando seu custo de metamorfose.)
Toda vez que Caminhante dos Pinheiros ou outra criatura que você controla for voltada para cima, desvire aquela criatura.

foreignNames.name: Сосноброд
foreignNames.text:
Оборотень {4}{G} (Вы можете разыграть эту карту рубашкой вверх как существо 2/2 за {3}. Переверните ее рубашкой вниз в любой момент за ее стоимость Оборотня.)
Каждый раз, когда Сосноброд или другое существо под вашим контролем переворачивается рубашкой вниз, разверните то существо.

foreignNames.name: 松林行者
foreignNames.text:
变身{4}{G}（你可牌面朝下地施放此牌并支付{3}，将其当成2/2生物。可随时支付其变身费用使其翻回正面。）
每当松林行者或另一个由你操控的生物翻回正面时，重置该生物。

foreignNames.name: 松林行者
foreignNames.text:
變身{4}{G}（你可牌面朝下地施放此牌並支付{3}，將其當成2/2生物。可隨時支付其變身費用使其翻回正面。）
每當松林行者或另一個由你操控的生物翻回正面時，重置該生物。

cards.originalText:
Morph {4}{G} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)
Whenever Pine Walker or another creature you control is turned face up, untap that creature.
